website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quality concerns, this set is a good choice for a pair of badminton competitors.
pros: Doubles set with 2 rackets and a carrying bag
Comes with 5 LED shuttlecocks that light up as you play
Rackets have nice weight and are reasonably durable
cons: Strings are prone to coming loose or breaking
Grip tape has the tendency to unravel over time

customer_reviews.title: Two birdies ended up on a roof overnight with the lights on
customer_reviews.text: Two birdies ended up on a roof overnight with the lights turned on on the birdies. We knew a rainstorm was coming that night so left them up there. The storm blew them within reach the next day and, amazingly, the lights didn't die yet. Also, I think I might have been...not paying attention...when I ordered this. It doesn't come with a net. We went out to set it up for game night and now we all have just decided to play Calvinminton instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Low quality. Amazing at first, then birdies and racquet broke
customer_reviews.text: At first, this set was amazing...I used this set about four times until my racket started unwraveling...it never touched the ground it broke from hitting a birdie. Also, the birdies LEDs die very quickly. One died and never turned on after one hit. Low quality but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice rackets but flashing birdies are distracting.
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be a good set of rackets though they have been only used for a few days. The strings are taunt and the tape has stayed on the handles. I have mixed feeling about the light up birdies. They are a great concept but they flash, as in they don't stay lit continuously. This makes it hard to see in the dark. Also, I have used them in daylight and they switch on while playing. So far, I like the rackets but I would prefer the birdies stayed on continuously.
customer_reviews.author: nancyro

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: Rackets are light and strong. The lighting idea for those shuttlecocks are great!! I was able to see the balls at night when we play... Customer service from Amazon was great. The mesh on one of my rackets was broken after 30 mins of playing. I contacted Amazon customer service and informed them this matter, they exchanged me a new set right away!! Thank you Amazon! I hope the new set will last longer!! Haha!!
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun at its Finest
customer_reviews.text: These rackets are solid. Only been playing for a day but doesn't seem cheap. The shuttle cocks are bright! In playing for 30 minutes outside they shut off 3 times but we just had to push the button and they turned back on. Our new family fav! Edit: The tape on the handle on one racquet is starting to unravel after two days time. Racquet itself is still great.
customer_reviews.author: bjs

customer_reviews.title: Racket overall Madewell the grip tape upgrade needed get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The racket quality is stitched well the strength of the shift is well the grip wrap is very poor scale 1 to 10 on the grip wrap give it a five after a few days it came off our use electrical tape works better but I do like the racket it comes with a six pack of shuttlecocks a.k.a. Birdie’s Now these are 10 out of 10 They are very well-made pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.author: Reconron

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy light-weight rackets, flimsy shuttlecocks
customer_reviews.text: The rackets are light weight but sturdy. They are adult size but my 8 year old loves them too. The shuttlecocks are another story. The LED light is a nice feature but these are genuine feather shuttlecocks and one lasts just a few days when you play with kids. They are nice and balanced, just not for kids play. I’ll be getting some plastic shuttlecocks to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia E.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about these rackets - probably worth the 10$ ones you can get at your local sports shop. Don't be fooled by the Amazon's Choice tag on this product. The handle wraps are thin with the plastic in place reducing grip. The strings are very lightweight and will tear fast.
customer_reviews.author: Navin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality WAY better than the ones typically included with net kits
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because shuttlecocks were getting stuck in the rackets after 3 seasons of play. These ones are much higher quality. The strings are thicker and tighter. The LED shuttlecocks are a great added bonus. I honestly didn’t expect to use them, but they work fantastic and we can play with them well after dark.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit products, be careful.
customer_reviews.text: j🌪 It took a few hours for the handle to break, and I saw the inside of the handle was rubbish wood and it was still knotted wood. I thought it would be fine to buy expensive reviews. I was wrong! I saw that no brand name can't be bought here, everyone is careful.
customer_reviews.author: dong

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Love that it comes with a back to put the rackets and birdie back in it once we are done playing. Really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Broken net in a week
customer_reviews.text: Instead of making decent badminton rackets, the put a fake gift card in the package. Also, the racket net broken after 5 games. I had a bad feeling when I first received this racket set. It does not feel handy. Also, the strings were too loose. Overall, it is more like the $10 set that you get it from the dollar store. Forget about the LED shuttlecocks, it is not practical at all. Wasted.
customer_reviews.author: GoodLife

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: The badminton racket is very easy to use, it is very convenient to use, is the badminton and so on bright for a while no... Still, it's recommended
customer_reviews.author: Fangyi Li

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the quality of the racket. The birdies are really cool because they light up, thus you can have a fun, challenging game after dark.
customer_reviews.author: mark vest

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of badminton rackets for the money. They are sturdy and relatively light and quite bouncy when hit the birds. The four birds that come with the rackets are also in good qualities. The plastic bag that come with it is a bit rough. It might last a few months if you use it once a week. Overall, I am very satisfied for the money I pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Luffy

customer_reviews.title: We had so much fun !
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, my husband and I played it until we could not stand anymore, and it was a lot of fun for us. rackets fell great in the hand. All in all, we are very happy with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tijana

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and sturdy but grip is not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good racket for beginners . Light weight and solid framing. The grip on the racket handle came off in 4 days of play. I could see the wooden handle between the grip rolls. First of all the thin plastic sheet on the grip was not removable which makes the racket to slip from my hands. And then after 4 days , the grip came off. I had to buy additional grips within the first week of play to put it on top of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Balaji

customer_reviews.title: Night owl can play badminton now.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The shuttlecock can lighted. This would be good if you are a night owl. It is not that bright to see so it has to be dark. Cons: The shuttlecock is heavy compared to others. ( it has the battery and led to light) The handle was worn out already after three time uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap, you get what you paid for. However the grip tape is especially cheap, it has this vinyl texture to it and hurts your hand when you play with it. The bag is pretty cheap as well, the material isn’t a stiffer plastic so it won’t stay flat like in the picture, especially the thinner end, unless you have something to push against it, it’s not bad but if you are someone that gets annoyed by things like this I suggest a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is very poor quality as the racquets are broken within 2 weeks of time. This is certainly NOT worth $30. I really wish I could order another brand. I always believe in quality for higher price items, so I never mind paying the high prices as long as the quality is maintained, whereas this doesn't case.
customer_reviews.author: Nandakumar Thukkaram

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Rackets are made of good material, and led shuttlecocks light up like they are supposed to. No issues with product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad A Halim

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend others too
customer_reviews.text: The led light in the cork gets turned on automatically if you hit it hard while playing. But that is not my concern as led light is not something I bought this for! Rest of the product is as expected. Would recommend others too.
customer_reviews.author: Kundan raja

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this based on customer reviews... The case was falling apart from the day 1, but rackets are holding up after a few plays. The LED in shuttlecocks no longer works. No the best quality
customer_reviews.author: The Muse

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Great exercise with my family
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Great exercise with my family. Shuttlecock has LED lights( how brilliant, awesome) so I can play even it is dark out side. Good quality . I highly recommend!! I am 100% satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Best badminton set
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to learn how to play and did not expect them to be so sturdy. Birdies hold their shape after a week of 1 hour lessons everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Villaverde

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The birdies are amazing! Super sturdy and they light up! Real feather birdies are the way to go from now on. This set was definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Alyse Urquhart

customer_reviews.title: Not worth for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if worth for the money..a little cheap looking..but light weight.. Definitely could have bought a better quality for the money spent..
customer_reviews.author: Chiran Nawalage

customer_reviews.title: Super obsessed! MUST GET
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove the way these feel, doesn’t feel cheap like the ones you get at WM. The thing I love the most is the birdies, my husband and I play at night, so it’s awesome that they light up, they are the best thing ever! Kind of OBSESSED!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Chavez

customer_reviews.title: the LED shuttlecocks are very cool. The grips of the rackets came with a ...
customer_reviews.text: For the modest price, this is a decent starter set. the LED shuttlecocks are very cool. The grips of the rackets came with a protective plastic covering that I suggest keeping on there if you can still grip the handle well. Grip tape could be applied a little better, it started peeling on one of ours after some use, but this is easily fixable with new tape.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Legault

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have kids.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend people who has kids to buy this set. Since it’s LeD ball. It will damage kids’ eye. Price is acceptable. The ball’s quality we played it’s not well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Yousong Lu

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived on time and in perfect condition. We have used the rackets once and ...
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and in perfect condition. We have used the rackets once and 3 of the shuttlecocks, for about 20 minutes. Everything worked fine, the shuttlecock lights sometimes come on without any help (pushing the switch). I believe a good buy for the casual user for the price.
customer_reviews.author: IMRU2

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. If you want a pair to entertain the kids or for basic exercise these are perfect. The kids will love the led lights.
customer_reviews.author: global_nomad

customer_reviews.title: The balls are too heavy! The rackets are also too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: There are lights on the balls, and make the balls incredible heavy! The rackets are too heavy too use! There are some many fake reviews!!!! Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: yunyiwang

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Was good while it lasted. Only a few weeks in and the racquet is destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I really like and enjoy planning badminton. I do like that shuttlecock has option to turn the light on. It's comfortable for adults and kids.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Badminton racket string got broken in just two games. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: krishna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money.. bad quality.. damaged goods..wont recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This racket is of no use. we barely played it for few times, the string tore off. Not worth at all. And It has been already a month I can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shristi Regmi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to have, and the LED shuttlecocks are so cool, made with feathers instead of molded plastic. The rackets are nice and sturdy, but lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Packer

customer_reviews.title: Racket net broke
customer_reviews.text: The racket net broke after 10 times playing, the birdies are not high qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay okay, not good, not bad.
customer_reviews.text: The rackets are light weighted but the strings are not so tight. The shuttles are not much good, some are heavy, some are light. The control of the racket is not that much good as well. It's good for those who have just started or learning the game. But not good for playing in a competition.
customer_reviews.author: MD Tanim Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Solid set for the price! Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the money. Awesome for beginners. Not flimsy, pretty solid for the price. Have fun outside!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the Racket is poor. It does not come into hand nicely. I have to add extra grip to the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Harsha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: The kids say this is a quality set, nice and sturdy! No comparison to the cheap $5 one from Five Below. And they love the LED birdies. HIghly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: henfeathers

customer_reviews.title: Very useful in the dark
customer_reviews.text: The light makes it a big heavy and you can’t see the light unless it’s dark
customer_reviews.author: Annie Dawood

customer_reviews.title: such a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised by the quality of the products with the price. Rackets are lightweight and the shuttlecocks with LED are very cool. Love them~
customer_reviews.author: Jing Shi

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The weight is light for these rackets, but the wrap for the handles are loose.
customer_reviews.author: david lee

customer_reviews.title: Great badminton set with lighted shuttlecocks
customer_reviews.text: Great badminton set with lighted shuttlecocks. Great seller and great price. Fast 2 day shipping with Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Sun M

customer_reviews.title: Looks very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good strong set. I'll be giving this as a gift to school age children and it appears to be strong enough for them. Love the lighted shuttlecocks. sure to be a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! The LED shuttlecocks are great....with one exception. They turn on when you don't want them to and off when you need them on. Maybe it's the way they are hitting the racquet?
customer_reviews.author: GrnEyedLdy

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Had some kids here for a party and set up badminton in the back yard. They had a lot of fun. The rackets survived - a definite recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, exactly what I was looking for. Also, the shuttlecock lits up at night. I love it! It’s a must buy.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, started breaking
customer_reviews.text: Played only 4 times since we brought it. Already the mesh is coming out and even the handle grip is coming out. Worst product i ever brought on Amazon, I am thinking of returning
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: This product was really great and would highly recommend. The LEDs were amazing and they glowed beautifly at night. I got this item to start training with my brother and sister and they really enjoyed playing the sport now. The rackets have a comfortable grip and the bag is handy to keep the items along with others items for tbe sport as well. I'm confident that I will buy another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jheremy Iparraguirre

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!  Great set
customer_reviews.text: Second order of these to completely replace original set that came with badminton net. These are great and appear to be holding up with the kids and friends. Great quality and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: NStanley

customer_reviews.title: chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: are you joking? what is this quality? the handles of the racket have a strong chemical smell, it is absorbed into the hands! I bought a game for a child! how do i give her these rackets ?? give me back my money and take your rackets!
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Good quality we bought for the first time!
customer_reviews.text: We always buy badminton, and easily messed up... This time we got a good quality! Been using it everyday! I'm Happy that it won't disappoint my family this time! Haha

customer_reviews.title: love it! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: love it! Good quality. I'm not a professional. I think it is good enough for me to have fun. really love the LED shuttlecock!!

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great deal !!!!! I was initially skeptical while ordering however the racket quality is great. Shuttle cock quality could be better but this deal is excellent value for money :-)

customer_reviews.text: The grip tape is especially cheap. They are adequate for the kids now.

customer_reviews.title: Grip tape got ripped within 3 days
customer_reviews.text: This is very poor quality as the racquets are broken within 2 weeks of time and grip tape got ripped within 3 days

customer_reviews.text: My family usually tears up badminton racquets, but these lasted all summer. They still seem just as solid as the day I got them. Recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set up indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Our family and neighbor kids are thoroughly enjoying this badminton set! The rackets are a very good quality and the LED shuttlecocks are perfect for our life in Alaska with darkness and snow coming on. The kids love that they will be able to see the shuttlecock when they play with snow covered ground. It makes it all that much more fun for playing.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with
customer_reviews.text: Rackets seem well made, was pleasantly surprised that shuttlecocks have actual feathers. Very pleased with purchase

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product, the LED shuttlecocks were very high quality, I would recommend this for leisure play

customer_reviews.text: Great beginner kit for two children to be busy with when out of school

customer_reviews.text: Rackets seem to be a good quality. I love the goose feather birdies. Last much longer than the plastic ones. Only issue is the lights turning on & off. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.author: Edelyn Parker

product_meta.title: Trained Premium Quality Set of Badminton Rackets, Pair of 2 Rackets, Lightweight & Sturdy, with 5 LED SHUTTLECOCKS, for Professional & Beginner Players Adults and Children, Carrying Bag Included
feature_bullets: PREPARE TO ACE! – With our top quality, badminton racket you will certainly rule the court! And our package includes a set of two, so you can give the second one to your significant other and start training to enter doubles tournaments! Also makes a great for Christmas gift bags.

SUITABLE FOR PLAYERS OF ANY LEVEL! – Little does it matter if you’re a professional player or if you’ve never seen a shuttlecock before in your life; our top quality badminton rackets are perfect for both practicing your skills and training! Mom, Dad, son and daughter can all play.

EXCELLENT GIFT IDEA FOR THE ONES YOU LOVE! – Whether you get it for your son, best friend, your spouse or, why not, yourself, our badminton racket set, along with the LED shuttlecocks, is an ideal present; smart, practical and fun – who wouldn’t love it? Endless fun with the kids, boys or girls.

ONLY THE BEST QUALITY FOR YOU! – Our badminton rackets come to you pre-strung by the manufacturer, are extremely lightweight, easy to use, and made of high-end quality materials that ensure their strength, durability, and longevity!

BUY WITH PEACE OF MIND! – We have given our best in order to offer you a top-notch quality product at an excellent, antagonistic price. However, if you aren’t entirely satisfied with our rackets, we offer you a full money back guarantee – no questions asked!
